issues.fullMessage: This async method lacks 'await' operators and will run synchronously. Consider using the 'await' operator to await non-blocking API calls, or 'await Task.Run(...)' to do CPU-bound work on a background thread.

properties.title: Async method lacks 'await' operators and will run synchronously

issues.fullMessage: This async method lacks 'await' operators and will run synchronously. Consider using the 'await' operator to await non-blocking API calls, or 'await Task.Run(...)' to do CPU-bound work on a background thread.

properties.title: Async method lacks 'await' operators and will run synchronously

issues.shortMessage: 'System.Exception' should not be thrown by user code.
issues.fullMessage: Throwing such general exceptions as Exception, SystemException, ApplicationException, IndexOutOfRangeException, NullReferenceException, OutOfMemoryException and ExecutionEngineException prevents calling methods from handling true, system-generated exceptions differently than application-generated errors.

properties.title: General exceptions should never be thrown
